trans-unit.source: Represents system information regarding a SOAP message header.
trans-unit.target: 表示与 SOAP 消息头有关的系统信息。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Channels.MessageHeaderInfo" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Channels.MessageHeaderInfo" /> 类的新实例。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the intended recipient of the message header.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置消息头的目标接收方。

trans-unit.source: A URI that indicates the intended recipient of the message header.
trans-unit.target: 一个URI，指示消息头的目标接收方。

trans-unit.source: If this property is empty, the header is interpreted as targeted for the ultimate recipient of the message.
trans-unit.target: 如果此属性为空，则消息头被解释为以消息的最终接收方为目标。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that specifies whether the message header represents reference parameters of an endpoint reference.
trans-unit.target: 获取一个值，该值指定消息头是否表示终结点引用的引用参数。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the message header represents reference parameters of an endpoint reference; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果消息头表示终结点引用的引用参数，则为 <see langword="true" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: A reference parameter corresponds to the <`ReferenceParameters`> element described in the in the [WS-Addressing specification](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=96163).
trans-unit.target: 引用参数对应于 <`ReferenceParameters`> 元素中所述在[Ws-addressing 规范](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=96163)。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether processing the message header is mandatory or optional.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示对消息头的处理是强制的还是可选的。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if processing the message header is mandatory; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果强制要求进行消息标头处理，则为 <see langword="true" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: If this property is `true` and the message receiver cannot interpret the message header, the message is not processed and an exception is thrown.
trans-unit.target: 如果此属性为 `true` 且消息接收方无法解释消息头，则不会处理消息并且会引发异常。

trans-unit.source: If this property is `false`, the receiver can ignore the message header and continue processing.
trans-unit.target: 如果此属性为 `false`，则接收方可忽略消息头并继续进行处理。

trans-unit.source: Gets the name of the message header.
The name of the message header.
Gets the namespace of the message header.
trans-unit.target: 获取消息头的命名空间。

trans-unit.source: The namespace of the message header.
Gets or sets a value that indicates whether the message header can be relayed.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示消息头是否可中转。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the message header can be relayed; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果消息头可中转，则为 <see langword="true" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The SOAP specification defines a header block as one that can be relayed in the forwarded message if the header block is targeted at a role acted on by the SOAP intermediary, but not otherwise processed by the intermediary.
trans-unit.target: SOAP 规范是这样定义标头块的，如果标头块以由 SOAP 媒介操作的角色为目标时，标头块可在转发消息内中转，但是该媒介不能对标头块进行其他任何处理。
